title: Collaborative Learning-Based Computational Thinking Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental programming concepts and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Math-based computational problem-solving activities utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners decompose and structure complex mathematical problems step-by-step through collaborative activities, applying computational thinking
Logically explain algorithm design and data analysis processes through team member interactions
Produce computational thinking-based problem-solving outputs via projects reflecting real-world job contexts

resources: Collaboration tools (online whiteboards, version control systems)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
